definitions.definition: Something or someone that has been ruined .
examples: He was an emotional wreck after the death of his wife.

definitions.definition: The remains of something that has been severely damaged or worn down.
An event in which something is damaged through collision .

subdefinitions.definition: A shipwreck : an event in which a ship is heavily damaged or destroyed.

definitions.definition: Goods , etc. cast ashore by the sea after a shipwreck .
A large number of birds that have been brought to the ground, injured or dead, by extremely adverse weather.

main_definition: Something or someone that has been ruined .
secondary_definitions: The remains of something that has been severely damaged or worn down.
An event in which something is damaged through collision .
( law , uncountable ) Goods , etc. cast ashore by the sea after a shipwreck .
( ornithology ) A large number of birds that have been brought to the ground, injured or dead, by extremely adverse weather.
